mapper.insert: insert into product(name, price, merchant_id, category_id, video, image, source, status, description, create_time, update_time ) values (#{name}, #{price}, #{merchantId}, #{categoryId}, #{video}, #{image}, #{source}, #{status}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select * from product left join category on product.category_id = category.id where product.name like concat('%', #{searchInfo}, '%') or category.name like concat('%', #{searchInfo}, '%')
